content: Update Demo.jsx with complete gating logic (demo expiry, phone verification, admin bypass)
Streamline ChatInterface - remove excessive clarifying question loops, make conversation natural
Integrate FeedbackDialog after successful generation in ChatInterface
Add demo expiry countdown timer to Demo page header
Handle 401 demo_expired and 403 phone_verification_required errors in axios interceptor
Test complete demo flow end-to-end with screenshot verification
